author: Micky-kun
install_msg:
⏲️ **Timeouts for Red V3**
Thanks for installing. Since timeouts are not native to discord.py, this cog is making a handshake response to the API. Once Red fully supports timeouts, this cog will be deprecated. This cog also writes to your guild mod log, if you have one set of course. This should make managing timeouts easier on your server. Anyway, enjoy the cog!
